name: Leveling Ticket 1★
description: A small leveling ticket that gives 100 EXP to your waifu/husbando.

description: A medium leveling ticket that gives 500 EXP to your waifu/husbando.

name: Leveling Ticket 3★
description: A medium leveling ticket that gives 1000 EXP to your waifu/husbando.

name: Leveling Ticket 4★
description: A large leveling ticket that gives 5000 EXP to your waifu/husbando.

name: Leveling Ticket 5★
description: A very large leveling ticket that gives 10000 EXP to your waifu/husbando.
